thread.section_title: Amatteroffax Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Amatteroffax | www.amatteroffax.com
thread.title: Matt Kerns

author: Matt Kerns
title: Matt Kerns
text: A Matter of Fax carried the toner I needed at a great price compared to many other vendors (38.8% cheaper at the low volume entry point as I just wanted to test the cartridges before going all in). The transaction was very easy. Only thing I see room for improvement is the speed at which the order is processed and shipped out. I plan on ordering my toner from them going forward.
